trends: There have been no other sightings in Ethel
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: A white hovering light that lingered until it was spotted.
divs: Sighting DetailsWas setting around with my best friend, singing songs and just hanging out. I was 14 and he was 16 at the time. We were just sitting around bsing at the time, and at exactly at the same time we noticed a bright white round light above us. It hovered a minute as if it noticed us seeing it, and then it shot up and away at an alarming rate of speed. What caught my attention was it was not initially moving when we spotted it.
